column1: What are you thankful for this Thanksgiving? If it’s having at least one member of Congress who stays true to these principles most Americans share even when unpopular among partisans and DC elites please consider making a donation to our campaign. Let’s do this!  👇👇👇 https://t.co/gd0bLWG5cR
“Amash’s campaign slogan should be: ‘Vote for someone who is as disgusted with Congress as you are.’”  ☝️☝️☝️ https://t.co/LMRUnzO26r

Team Amash is looking for excellent communicators who are well versed in libertarianism/classical liberalism and big fans of @justinamash. If that’s you send your résumé and a letter of interest to jobs@justinamash.com.
